DESCRIPTION: Allows you to configure the server's goodbye message and channel.
EXAMPLES:
$setleave on
$setleave off
$setleave reset
$setleave channel <mention>
$setleave message <message>
$setleave options
OPTIONS_TITLE: Here are the settings available for the goodbye message.
OPTIONS:
**{user}**-The mention of the user
**{user.name}**-The name of the user
**{user.tag}**-The name + tag of the user
**{user.createdat}**-The creation date of the user's account
**{user.id}**-The id of the user
**{guild}**-The name of the server
**{guild.count}**-The number of members on the server
**{inviter}**-The mention of the user who invited him
**{inviter.tag}**-The name + tag of the user who invited him
**{inviter.name}**-The name of the user who invited him
**{inviter.id}**-The id of the user who invited him
**{inviter.invites}**-The number of invitations of the user who invited him
**{invite.code}**-The code of the invitation used
**{invite.uses}**-The number of times the invitation was used
**{invite.url}**-The URL of the invitation
ALREADY_ENABLED: The goodbye message is already activated.
CHANNEL_NOT_SET: Unable to activate the goodbye message until the goodbye channel is configured or invalid.
MESSAGE_NOT_SET: Cannot activate goodbye message until message is configured.
ENABLED: The goodbye message has been activated.
DISABLED: The goodbye message has been deactivated.
ALREADY_DISABLED: The goodbye message is already deactivated.
CONFIRM_RESET: Please confirm that you are sure you want to reset the goodbye message configuration. Type ``-confirm`` to confirm or ``cancel`` to cancel.
CANCELLED: The reset of the goodbye message configuration has been canceled.
RESET_SUCCESS: Goodbye message configuration has been reset successfully.
TIMEOUT: The time is up, you have not validated that you want to reset the configuration of the goodbye message.
CHANNEL_SUCCESS: The goodbye channel has been configured successfully.
NO_ARGS_MESSAGE: Please specify a message. You can find the available parameters with {{prefix}}setleave options.
NON_EXISTENT_CHANNEL: Cannot configure goodbye message until channel is configured or invalid.
TOO_LONG: Your goodbye message is too long, it must not exceed 1000 characters.
MESSAGE_SUCCESS: The goodbye message has been configured correctly.
NO_ARGS: Please specify an action: on, off, reset, channel, message, options.
NO_PERM: Please give me permission to send messages in this channel or specify a different one.
